name: Planet planes
description:
This game was made for team  'Bornwave's 5th  jam. Game will receive updates over the time, and if you find any bugs make sure to report them Discussion board.

Goal

The goal of the game is to go around 4 planets and collect planes in order to survive.. you'll survive by providing those planes to the main planet, and if you don't you will lose.

Controls

Movement - W, A, S, D, Space and Left-Shift.

  1. W - move forward
  2. A - move to the left
  3. S - move backwards
  4. D - move to the right
  5. Space - jump
  6. Left-Shift - sprint

Camera - mouse.
